Name: Beach Iced Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: A Long Island Iced Tea with cranberry juice instead of cola.
Nutrition: One serving of Beach Iced Tea contains 262 calories
